description: Control Finder application through AppleScript with full class hierarchy support
long_description: This enhanced extension allows you to control Finder through its official AppleScript API with complete class hierarchy support. Property getters and setters now include the full object path for precise targeting. Includes static data functions for exploring the application's complete class structure and command mappings.
